Also, Jane and Michael Stern are at The Red Truck Bakery in Warrenton, Va., and Hank Shaw teaches us to harvest spring trees.

title: Lidia's Ziti
description: This week, it's another installment of our series The Key 3, conversations with good cooks about the three recipes they think are essential. Also, Jane and Michael Stern are at The Red Truck Bakery in Warrenton, Va., and Hank Shaw teaches us to harvest spring trees.
